function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased vulnerability and higher fatality rates associated with contagious diseases","Impact":"Higher fatality rates and increased vulnerability to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce spread of contagious diseases, improving healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Data analytics for disease tracking, advanced medical equipment for treatment, public health education campaigns","People":"General public, healthcare workers, at-risk populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of green spaces on infection risk","Impact":"Distribution of green areas affecting infection risk and health inequity","Mitigation":"Creating and maintaining green spaces, addressing health inequities, promoting access to green areas","Technologies":"Urban planning and design, remote sensing for monitoring green spaces, community engagement for green space development","People":"Community members, urban planners, public health organizations","Owner":"Local governments, environmental agencies, community organizations"},{"Description":"Correlation between urban population density and pandemics","Impact":"Correlation between population density and pandemics; higher rates in urban areas and potential lack of correlation in some regions","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to manage population density, developing effective preventive measures in urban areas, improving healthcare access in densely populated areas","Technologies":"Data analysis for population density mapping, urban planning and infrastructure development, telemedicine and remote healthcare services","People":"Urban residents, healthcare workers, policymakers","Owner":"City governments, public health authorities, urban planning agencies"}]}
